Articles.Content:
Hello, my name is Rienspy (or Rien irl), my previous acount got deleted by the forum crash in the past so I have to make another 10 posts before I can do awesome things on this forums!

I have been playing KSP for some time now (I think I stepped on the spacetrain with version .18, or was it .19?) and my greatest achievement so far was landing on Ike and returning to the KSP centre. (I've aso done missions to Eeloo and Laythe, but they never came back.)

I'm also think about making some youtube videos about KSP, but I don't know what do you guys still need from youtube (Scott Manley, Danny and some other youtubers are really good, and I don't think I can compete with those guys).

Sadly enough, I'm going on a vacation to France this sunday, so I'll probably miss the release of .21

Aw. it's not all bad. Mods might be compatible by the time you get back.

Also, Welcome back!

Yeah, that's true

And thanks!

Edit: Thank you mod for activating my account to do awesome things
